item.title: Firstone
item.content:
Everything has a beginning…

So I decided to give it a go with this HUGO engine and start a blog with the help of it and use Typora to help me structure my posts… I wonder if this is going to work well tho…

Where to start with a new blog?

Just testing around… at the end of the day that’s what this is for actually…

Everything’s complicated like giving a name to the blog…

So we continue our testing later on today… right now need to prep for my 1v1 and my connect… :)
